title: Simply Counting Births and Deaths Could Solve Health Inequity in Africa
text:
Simply Counting Births and Deaths Could Solve Health Inequity in Africa 
Published By: Gizmodo.com - Today 
In Africa, only four countries record more than 75% of their births and deaths. This creates an unequal system and impacts on how government... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
